features: Chip Budget System - Allocate monthly 'chips' for each habit
Rollover Support - Unused chips carry over to the next month
CloudKit Sync - Automatic sync across all your devices via iCloud
Comprehensive Statistics - Track streaks, averages, and usage patterns
Home Screen Widgets - Quick access widget for tracking on the go
Calendar View - Visual representation of daily usage
Multiple Charts - Budget utilization, daily averages, monthly trends
Achievement Badges - Gamification to encourage positive habits
Personal Records - Track your best streaks and milestones
Dark Mode Support - Multiple app icon variants
fullDescription: ViceChips is a modern iOS habit tracking app built with Swift 6 and SwiftUI, featuring a unique 'chip budget' system for managing personal habits. Unlike traditional habit trackers, ViceChips uses a gamified approach where you allocate a monthly budget of 'chips' to each habit, helping you maintain balance and moderation. With comprehensive statistics, beautiful charts, and CloudKit sync, ViceChips makes it easy to track your progress and build better habits over time.
